fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Choose a card type, and steal 1 card from another player, prioritizing the type you chose.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Choose a card type, and steal 3 cards from another player, prioritizing the type you chose. 

*If no cards of the chosen type are found, a random card will instead be stolen. If a card type is not selected when played, a random card will be stolen.*
